description => UTF-8 string (799) "Metro Fashion present beautiful Pink gold foil design ,long anarkali , print...
$value['description']
Metro Fashion present beautiful Pink gold foil design ,long anarkali , printed kurta for comfortable fit .We have combination of fine quality fabric finish , latest design and trending fashion , fast Color and combination of this kurti set is so trendy , classy and festive , this ethnic kurta, long pink dress looks pretty good and beautiful exactly the same as in the picture. The fabric is nice and it fits well, this designer piece with jaipuri print can be wear at all occasion like party , festivals , wedding as well as in functions , keep the accessories minimal for that added elegant look, just your favorite heels and dangling earrings, and of course, don’t forget your pretty smile, Garment is made of rayon , which is 100% natural fabric that is suitable for all weather and winters .
⇄⧉
